client
Class ClientWithToken

java.lang.Object
  client.ClientWithToken

public class ClientWithToken
extends java.lang.Object

The wrapper class around restlet's client to add the authentication token to be sent to the server. It adds a new header "x-token" with a string containing the user name and the token. The server will use this request credentials to perform actual command execution as needed.

Author:
Mamta

Method Detail

get

public org.restlet.data.Response get(java.lang.String path)
Perform a GET on a resource path. The path can be "http://..." or just "/path/to/resource" where the second case uses the default login device as the server part. The response is returned by the method.

Parameters:
path -
Returns:

put

public org.restlet.data.Response put(java.lang.String path,
                                     org.restlet.resource.Representation entity)
Perform a PUT on a resource path. The path can be "http://..." or just "/path/to/resource" where the second case uses the default login device as the server part. The supplied representation of the entity is sent in the request body to the server.

Parameters:
path -
Returns:
